pages.text: The $(mob)Creeper Girl$() is a creature that can be spawned from the $(thing)Creeper Girl Egg$(). It flees when attacked, but can trade various items in exchange for $(item)Gunpowder$(), similar to a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$().
$(mob)Creeper Girls$() can drop a $(item)Creeper Girl Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(l:grimoireofgaia_spawn_creeper_girl)$(mob)Creeper Girl$() helper for the player.
